mcq.statement: Mewar refused to accept the friendship of the Mughals because:

options.a: Mewar had hostility with the Mughals since the days of Rana Sanga There were hostile relations between Mewar and Amber
options.b: which had entered intomatrimonial alliance with the Mughals
options.c: Mewar considered it dishonorable to accept the friendship of the Mughals
